bibl.title: Nubian Cathedrals with Granite Columns: A View from Sai Island.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Bishoprics of medieval Nubia. - Medieval cathedrals with granite columns in Nubia. - The medieval Sai project. - Site 8-B-500 with granite columns on Sai Island. - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Henriette Hafsaas-Tsakos & Alexandros Tsakos, Nubian Cathedrals with Granite Columns: A View from Sai Island.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 389-410, 1 tabl., 8 figg.

Bishoprics of medieval Nubia. - Medieval cathedrals with granite columns in Nubia. - The medieval Sai project. - Site 8-B-500 with granite columns on Sai Island. - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
